pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate How many Imputations are Needed for Multiple Imputation // When performing multiple imputations, while 5-10 imputations are sufficient for obtaining point estimates, a larger number of imputations are needed for proper standard error estimates. This package allows you to calculate how many imputations are needed, following the work of von Hippel 2018 doi:10.1177/0049124117747303.
